===Etymology===
* From the poem: ''The Song of the [[w:Pipa|Pipa]] Player'' ([[琵琶行]]), by [[w:Bai Juyi|Bai Juyi]] (白居易)
: Literally: We are (two) people stranded (together) from the far corners of the realm.
